lead_paragraph: It's always an anticlimax to return to the everyday grind of the N.H.L. after the unrelenting drama of the Winter Games -- especially after this year's unbelievable Olympic final. But return we must, with one game to ease us back in. Home team listed first:
snippet: Results from game of Monday, March 1....

headline.main: N.H.L. Scoreboard: Back From the Olympics With a Detroit Win

abstract: Results from game of Monday, March 1.
